sentences.en: " Why should not the guilty ones sooner avail themselves of this unutterable solace? "
sentences.cn: “ 有负罪感的人为什么不尽早地让自己获得这种难言的慰藉 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: From the support and the solace of true companionship he was utterly cut off.
sentences.cn: 至于真正伴侣的帮助和安慰,他是完全绝缘了.

sentences.en: He sought solace in the whisky bottle.
Henry was inclined to seek solace in drink.
His acting career took a nosedive and he turned to drink for solace.
sentences.cn: 演艺事业突然一落千丈,他便借酒浇愁.

sentences.en: His career took a nosedive and he turned to drink and drugs for solace.
sentences.cn: 他的事业一落千丈,开始酗酒吸毒以寻求慰借.

sentences.en: His work has been a real solace to him.
sentences.cn: 他从工作中得到莫大的慰藉.

sentences.en: I don't know how to solace his grief.
sentences.cn: 我不知道如何安慰他使之减轻悲痛.

sentences.en: I had no solace from self - approbation ; none ever from self - respect .
sentences.cn: 我不能从自满、甚至不能从 自尊 中得到安慰.

sentences.en: I'm afraid he took his solace in drink.
Mary was a great solace to me after Arthur died.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟死后，玛丽就是我最大的安慰。

sentences.en: She finds solace of a kind in alcohol.
sentences.cn: 她从酒精中多少得到一些安慰。

sentences.en: She found the companionship of Marcia a solace.
sentences.cn: 她觉得马西娅的陪伴是莫大的安慰。

sentences.en: The invalid found solace in music.
sentences.cn: 那病人从音乐中得到安慰.

sentences.en: The news brought no solace to the grieving relations.
sentences.cn: 这个消息并未给悲痛的家属带来什么安慰.

sentences.en: They sought solace in religion from the harshness of their everyday lives.
sentences.cn: 他们日常生活很艰难,就在宗教中寻求安慰.

phrases.tran_cn: 用某物(或某事)安慰自己

trans.tran_en: a feeling of emotional comfort at a time of great sadness or disappointment
